name: Lighting the Way
source: Pathfinder #131: The Reaper's Right Hand pg. 79
text: You seek to lead others through your pious example.
prerequisites: Be a member of House Zespire, or have the Devoted, Exemplar, Marked by the Gods, or Righteous Mentor background.
benefit: Once per day as a standard action, you can give all allies within 30 feet who can hear you a +1 bonus on attack rolls and on saving throws against mind-affecting effects for 1 minute.
goal: Establish your religion in an existing settlement where it isnâ€™t present. You can do this by having a settlement gain the Holy Site or Pious quality for devotion to your deity, or change its government to a theocracy based on your religion.
completionBenefit: You can spontaneously convert any 2nd-level or higher divine spell into enthrall and can spontaneously convert any 3rd-level or higher divine spell into suggestion.
